ModMetaData.name: Adoptive Relationships
ModMetaData.author: lydocia
ModMetaData.description: Adoptive relationships to mirror the biologically related relationships buffs without overriding them. Adoptive relationships prohibit romantic relationships from naturally forming. Use Character Editor, Prepare Carefully or similar to add adoptive relationships between pawns. Included: - Adoptive mother - Adoptive father - Adoptive daughter - Adoptive son - Adoptive sister - Adoptive brother - Adoptive grandmother - Adoptive grandfather - Adoptive granddaughter - Adoptive grandson - Adoptive cousin
